name: Cashboard
headline: Cashboard is the analytics hub for finance teams
tags: industry:finops; industry:fintech; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:collaboration; location:new-york

founders.name: Julian Rowlands, Founder
founders.description: Scruffy & kind.  Scrappy jersey kid made good.  Rutgers history major -> Chicago Booth MBA -> worked all over Africa & Asia for 3 years -> startup finance leader -> raised $124m from Accel/Bessemer/Kleiner/YC/more -> started Cashboard in Spring '22.  Son of a writer.

# Great CFOs run data-driven businesses on Cashboard
Meet the analytics platform built for finance teams. Accelerate your daily and monthly internal reporting, securely share data with leaders across your company, and tighten feedback loops like never before.
Request a demo![Arrow Right](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/arrow-right.d02998560a2adec9427f77b94c308ba4.svg)
![dashboard overview](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/Cashboard - Hero Image.d0d773c1ff58a4bc5401.png)
Backed by
[![Y-Combinator Logo](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/ycombinator.b0e8b8a26c45c0c56b062cb1b44a9cdb.svg)](https://www.cashboard.co/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>)[![TTV Logo](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/ttv.a925c68784f470d2ebd9.png)](https://www.cashboard.co/<https:/ttvcapital.com/>)[SOC II, Type 2 Compliant![SOC2 Type 1 Badge](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/soc2badge.2b0f0d0f26ccf42a7f1d.png)](https://www.cashboard.co/<https:/www.aicpa-cima.com/resources/landing/system-and-organization-controls-soc-suite-of-services?>)
## Get your teams all the data they need — without having to hire
Leading CFOs spent the past decade building custom analytics platforms that combine financials and KPIs in one place. But this came at a price: huge analytics teams and 12-month buildouts.
With Cashboard, you’ll get world-class analytics and the dashboards your teams rely on, without having to hire or wait.
![Marketing BvA Image](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/Marketing BvA.cab985afd0f8ba8dff10.png)![Product Line Daily Numbers Image](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/Product Line Daily Numbers.1d39a47b817bab25e247.png)
## All your data in one place
Book a demo![Arrow Right](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/arrow-right-outline-green.9bd59de50f9fdc9c509d62eb586f43ec.svg)
![All Your Data Image](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/All Your Data.3dfee0111dd765c7be0b.png)
### Live data from all your systems
Live data constantly flows in from all your business systems via native API integrations, ensuring that what you see is accurate and up to date.
![Data Mapping Image](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/Data Mapping Crop.694d695d6a8c169d48cc.png)
### Automated data mapping
Cashboard keeps the mappings between your data sources up to date, allowing you to spin up filtered views of your data in seconds.
![Drill In On Anything Image](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/Drill In On Anything.4a048657eab728e2300a.png)
### Drill in on anything
Drill down into detailed data from any system with one click.
## Tell any story with powerful building blocks
Book a demo![Arrow Right](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/arrow-right-outline-green.9bd59de50f9fdc9c509d62eb586f43ec.svg)
![Financial Formats Image](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/Financial Formats.51bbf6004138adf40270.png)
### The financial formats you love with the KPIs leaders need
Create BvAs, Income Statements, any custom tables with any data or custom calculations you can imagine.
![Visualizations Image](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/Visualizations Crop.0b06dbd229c6c3bab07f.png)
### Beautiful tables and visualizations
Interactive charts, tables, and maps bring your data to life.
![Budgets and Forecasts Image](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/Budgets & Forecasts.2d6b4a8e292f2f6f3f9d.png)
### Budgets and forecasts
Instantly toggle between any of the budgets and forecasts you’ve synced with Cashboard.
## Share data with your teams, seamlessly and securely
Book a demo![Arrow Right](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/arrow-right-outline-green.9bd59de50f9fdc9c509d62eb586f43ec.svg)
![Team Boards Image](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/Team Boards.11326bd34894f02a73ad.png)
### Create accountability with boards for every team
With Team Boards, you can easily create custom-filtered boards with their own data and visualizations.
![Sensitive Data Image](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/Sensitive Data.09492a37aa14522a1b87.png)
### Hide sensitive data
Granularly set permissions on which data you want teammates to view.
![Commenting Image](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/Commenting.573083c107965e99a1c0.png)
### Have conversations where the numbers are
Keep feedback cycles tight with comments and notifications.
## Integrate all your data sources
Cashboard supports 200+ integrations, from ERPs and HRIS systems to CRMs, data warehouses, project management tools and spreadsheets.
![](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/quickbooks.b2eafef536d0dd2bdc46f0c610eeb54f.svg)

## Get started today.
Request a demo![Arrow Right](https://www.cashboard.co/static/media/arrow-right.d02998560a2adec9427f77b94c308ba4.svg)

generated_description:
**Cashboard: The Analytics Hub for Finance Teams**

Founded in 2021 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, Cashboard is revolutionizing how finance teams access and analyze their data. Based in New York, the company has a compact team of six talented employees, all dedicated to building a powerful analytics platform designed specifically for financial professionals.

At its core, Cashboard provides an analytics hub that enables finance teams to efficiently streamline their reporting processes. Gone are the days when companies needed to invest in large analytics teams for custom solutions. Cashboard empowers CFOs to run data-driven businesses with ease. It allows teams to rapidly generate internal reports, share insights securely across departments, and enhance their overall feedback cycles.

### Key Features

- **Centralized Data**: Cashboard aggregates live data from various business systems via seamless API integrations, ensuring that users always have accurate, real-time information at their fingertips.
  
- **Automated Data Mapping**: The platform keeps data source mappings updated, allowing users to create filtered views instantly without cumbersome setups.

- **Drill-down Capabilities**: With just a click, users can dive deep into detailed data to extract valuable insights.

- **Customizable Reports**: Create an array of financial statements and custom tables. Whether you need Budgets vs. Actuals or income statements, Cashboard has you covered.

- **Interactive Visualizations**: Transform raw data into engaging charts, tables, and maps, helping teams to visualize and understand their metrics at a glance.

- **Team Collaboration**: Cashboard facilitates easy sharing and interaction with data across teams. With Team Boards, you can create customized dashboards tailored to specific groups, while also controlling who sees what data to maintain confidentiality.

- **Integration Ready**: Offering over 200 integrations, Cashboard connects smoothly with popular platforms like QuickBooks, Salesforce, and Xero, allowing organizations to leverage their existing data systems without hassle.

### Mission and Vision

Cashboard's mission is simple yet compelling: to be the ultimate analytics hub for finance teams, easing the burden of data management and reporting, and fostering a culture of accountability and insight in organizations.

If you’re looking to supercharge your finance operations without the headache of hiring additional staff, Cashboard is worth exploring. They are determined to make world-class analytics not just accessible but also a norm for CFOs everywhere.

For more information and to see the platform in action, visit [Cashboard](https://www.cashboard.co) today. Whether you're a growing startup or an established company, Cashboard positions itself as a transformative tool in the fintech landscape.
